Name: Raisins
Description: Dried grapes that make for a tasty snack!

DescriptionLocalization.es: ¡Uvas deshidratadas transformadas en un rico aperitivo!
DescriptionLocalization.fr: Raisins secs qui font un en-cas savoureux !
DescriptionLocalization.hu: Szárított szőlő, mely egy ízletes nassolnivaló.
DescriptionLocalization.ja: この乾燥ブドウでおいしいおやつを作れる！
DescriptionLocalization.pt: Uvas desidratadas transformadas em um rico aperitivo!
DescriptionLocalization.zh: 葡萄干，是一种美味的小吃！
